body:
Running on Python3.6.3 using Cython 0.28.4

**test.pyx**
```
class Foo():
  def __init__(self):
    self.a = 1
```

**setup.py** 
```
from distutils.core import setup
from distutils.extension import Extension
from Cython.Build import cythonize

extensions = [
   Extension("*", ["*.pyx"],
     include_dirs = [...],
     libraries = [...],
     library_dirs = [...]),
]
setup(
  name = "test",
  ext_modules = cythonize(extensions, nthreads=16),
  )
```

Compiling line `python setup.py buildext --inplace`

**Result**
```
Compiling test.pyx because it changed.
[1/1] Cythonizing test.pyx
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "setup.py", line 13, in <module>
    ext_modules = cythonize(extensions, nthreads=16),
  File "/home/oh/.virtualenvs/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 1026, in cythonize
    cythonize_one(*args)
  File "/home/oh/.virtualenvs/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 1129, in cythonize_one
    result = compile_single(pyx_file, options, full_module_name=full_module_name)
  File "/home/oh/.virtualenvs/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Main.py", line 649, in compile_single
    return run_pipeline(source, options, full_module_name)
  File "/home/oh/.virtualenvs/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Main.py", line 499, in run_pipeline
    err, enddata = Pipeline.run_pipeline(pipeline, source)
  File "/home/oh/.virtualenvs/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 354, in run_pipeline
    data = run(phase, data)
  File "/home/oh/.virtualenvs/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 334, in run
    return phase(data)
  File "/home/oh/.virtualenvs/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 52, in generate_pyx_code_stage
    module_node.process_implementation(options, result)
  File "/home/oh/.virtualenvs/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ModuleNode.py", line 142, in process_implementation
    self.generate_c_code(env, options, result)
  File "/home/oh/.virtualenvs/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ModuleNode.py", line 353, in generate_c_code
    self.generate_module_preamble(env, options, modules, result.embedded_metadata, h_code)
  File "/home/oh/.virtualenvs/venv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ModuleNode.py", line 618, in generate_module_preamble
    code.putln(json.dumps(metadata, indent=4, sort_keys=True))
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/json/__init__.py", line 238, in dumps
    **kw).encode(obj)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py", line 201, in encode
    chunks = list(chunks)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py", line 430, in _iterencode
    yield from _iterencode_dict(o, _current_indent_level)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py", line 404, in _iterencode_dict
    yield from chunks
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py", line 404, in _iterencode_dict
    yield from chunks
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py", line 325, in _iterencode_list
    yield from chunks
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py", line 437, in _iterencode
    o = _default(o)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/json/encoder.py", line 180, in default
    o.__class__.__name__)
TypeError: Object of type 'ellipsis' is not JSON serializable
```
title: 'ellipsis' is not JSON serializable error when compiling using nthreads on Python3.6
